body: Juan Arellano spoke to Soraya Sacaan [es] and Juan José Retamal [es] of OCD Iberoamérica [es], a Chilean initiative whose mission is to "contribute to knowledge of digital communications in the private sector, academia and government to promote and understand its scope and application in society." Juan added both videos to a post about OCD for Periodismo Ciudadano [es].

Juan added both videos to a post about OCD for Periodismo Ciudadano [es].
title: Latin America: Conversations About OCD Iberoamérica
